short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate metadata for images using Gemini, Claude, and GPT APIs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Mixzer AI Generator is a Google Chrome extension designed to streamline the creation of prompts and metadata for images using advanced language models like Gemini, Claude, and GPT APIs. This tool is perfect for content creators, marketers, and designers looking to quickly generate creative prompts or image metadata tailored to their needs, enhancing workflows in applications such as MidJourney, Canva, and other visual creation platforms.

Prompt Generation: Using AI models from Gemini, Claude, and GPT, the extension allows users to generate unique, high-quality prompts for images, helping users kickstart the design process.

Metadata Creation: The extension generates detailed metadata, such as titles, tags, and descriptions, optimizing images for SEO and ensuring theyâ€™re easily discoverable.
